summary.span: 表示一系列相互连接的直线和曲线。

span.span: Represents a series of connected lines and curves.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序使用路径来绘制形状的轮廓、 填充的形状，内部和创建剪辑区域。Applications use paths to draw outlines of shapes, fill the interiors of shapes, and create clipping regions. 图形引擎维护世界坐标空间中的路径中的几何形状的坐标。The graphics engine maintains the coordinates of geometric shapes in a path in world coordinate space. 路径可能组成的任意数量的图形 （子路径）。A path may be composed of any number of figures (subpaths). 每个图或者组成一系列相互连接的直线和曲线或几何形状基元。Each figure is either composed of a sequence of connected lines and curves or a geometric shape primitive. 图形的起点是序列中的连接的直线和曲线的第一个点。The starting point of a figure is the first point in the sequence of connected lines and curves. 结束点是在序列中的最后一个点。The ending point is the last point in the sequence. 由基元规范定义几何形状基元的起始和结束点。The starting and ending points of a geometric shape primitive are defined by the primitive specification. 一个图，它包含一系列相互连接的直线和曲线 （其开始和结束点可以是同一） 是开放的图形，除非它被显式关闭。A figure that consists of a sequence of connected lines and curves (whose starting and ending points may be coincident) is an open figure, unless it is closed explicitly. 可以通过使用显式地关闭图方法，这会关闭当前图形通过连接一条从终结点到起始点。A figure can be closed explicitly, by using the method, which closes the current figure by connecting a line from the ending point to the starting point. 包含几何形状基元图是闭合的图。A figure that consists of a geometric shape primitive is a closed figure. 用于填充和剪辑的目的 (例如，如果使用呈现路径)、 所有打开图通过将行从图中的第一个点添加到其终结点已关闭。For purposes of filling and clipping (for example, if a path is rendered using ), all open figures are closed by adding a line from the figure's first point to its last point. 创建路径时或图形已关闭隐式启动一个新图形。A new figure is implicitly started when a path is created or when a figure is closed. 一个新图形时显式创建调用方法。A new figure is explicitly created when the method is called. 几何形状基元添加到路径，它将添加图形包含几何形状，并还将隐式开始一个新图形。When a geometric shape primitive is added to a path, it adds a figure containing the geometric shape, and also implicitly starts a new figure. 因此，没有始终在当前图形路径中。Consequently, there is always a current figure in a path. 时的直线和曲线将添加到路径中，根据需要连接到的新的直线和曲线以形成一系列相互连接的直线和曲线的起始点的当前图形的结束点被添加隐式行。When lines and curves are added to a path, an implicit line is added as needed to connect the ending point of the current figure to the starting point of the new lines and curves to form a sequence of connected lines and curves. 图中描述直线和曲线的段的起点和终点之间的跟踪方式的方向。A figure has a direction that describes how line and curve segments are traced between the starting point and the ending point. 中的直线和曲线添加到图中，或定义的几何形状基元的顺序定义了方向。The direction is defined in the order that lines and curves are added to a figure, or is defined by the geometric shape primitive. 方向是在确定剪辑以及填充的路径内部使用。The direction is used in determining the path interiors for clipping and fill.

span.span: Appends an elliptical arc to the current figure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果以前的行或在图中的曲线的行被添加上一个段的终结点连接到弧线的开头。If there are previous lines or curves in the figure, a line is added to connect the endpoint of the previous segment to the beginning of the arc. 圆弧轨迹沿着由指定矩形绑定的椭圆的周界。The arc is traced along the perimeter of the ellipse bounded by the specified rectangle. 通过从 （0 度角） 椭圆的 x 轴沿顺时针方向度量的中的开始角度度数确定弧线的起始点。The starting point of the arc is determined by measuring clockwise from the x-axis of the ellipse (at the 0-degree angle) by the number of degrees in the start angle. 通过从起始点沿顺时针方向度量的中的扫描角度度数位于同样到终结点。The endpoint is similarly located by measuring clockwise from the starting point by the number of degrees in the sweep angle. 如果大于 360 度或小于-360 度的扫描角度，是分别将弧线扫过完全 360 度或-360 度。If the sweep angle is greater than 360 degrees or less than -360 degrees, the arc is swept by exactly 360 degrees or -360 degrees, respectively. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个矩形，从中定义圆弧。Creates a rectangle, from which the arc is defined. - 创建一个路径`myPath`。Creates a path, `myPath`. - 定义 180 度椭圆弧扫过从 0 度到 180 度，并将其追加到的路径。Defines a 180-degree elliptical arc that sweeps from 0 degrees to 180 degrees and appends it to a path. - 向屏幕中绘制该路径。Draws the path to screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 三次曲线控制点为使用第二个和第三个点构造从第一个点到第四个点。The cubic curve is constructed from the first point to the fourth point by using the second and third points as control points. 如果没有上一个行或在图中的曲线段，添加一条线连接到三次曲线的起始点的上一个段的终结点。If there is a previous line or curve segment in the figure, a line is added to connect the endpoint of the previous segment to the starting point of the cubic curve. ## Examples 有关示例，请参见 。For an example, see .

param.name: points
param.span: 一个 结构的数组，它表示定义曲线的点。

span.span: An array of structures that represents the points that define the curves.

summary.span: 在当前图形中添加一系列相互连接的立方贝塞尔曲线。

span.span: Adds a sequence of connected cubic Bézier curves to the current figure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `points`参数指定终结点的数组和已连接的曲线的控制点。The `points` parameter specifies an array of endpoints and control points of the connected curves. 第一条曲线的第一个点从构造中的第四个点`points`作为管理点使用的第二个和第三个点的数组。The first curve is constructed from the first point to the fourth point in the `points` array by using the second and third points as control points. 除了前一条曲线的终结点，在序列中的每个后续曲线需要完全三个点： 序列中的接下来两个点是控点和第三个是添加曲线的终结点。In addition to the endpoint of the previous curve, each subsequent curve in the sequence needs exactly three more points: the next two points in the sequence are control points, and the third is the endpoint for the added curve. 如果以前的行或在图中的曲线，添加一条线连接到序列中第一个三次曲线的起始点的上一个段的终结点。If there are previous lines or curves in the figure, a line is added to connect the endpoint of the previous segment to the starting point of the first cubic curve in the sequence. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建七个点 （表示两个已连接的贝塞尔曲线） 的数组。Creates an array of seven points (representing two connected Bézier curves). - 创建一个路径，并将贝塞尔曲线点的一系列添加到路径。Creates a path and adds the series of Bézier curve points to the path. - 向屏幕中绘制该路径。Draws the path to screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/VB/form1.vb#3)]

span.span: A cardinal spline curve is used because the curve travels through each of the points in the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要则用户必须保留原始的点。The user must keep the original points if they are needed. 原始点可以转换为三次方贝塞尔曲线的控制点在内部，因此没有用于返回原始点机制。The original points are converted to cubic Bézier control points internally, therefore there is no mechanism for returning the original points. 如果第一个点和中的最后一个点`points`数组不是相同的点，通过连接这两个点来闭合曲线。If the first point and the last point in the `points` array are not the same point, the curve is closed by connecting these two points. 张力值不能设置为此方法，默认值为等效于 0.5 的值。The tension value cannot be set for this method, and defaults to a value equivalent to 0.5. ## Examples 有关示例，请参见 。For an example, see .

param.span: 介于 0 到 1 之间的一个值，它指定曲线在点与点之间弯曲的程度，0 表示最小弯曲（最锐拐角），1 表示最平滑弯曲。

span.span: A value between from 0 through 1 that specifies the amount that the curve bends between points, with 0 being the smallest curve (sharpest corner) and 1 being the smoothest curve.

summary.span: 向此路径添加一个闭合曲线。

span.span: Adds a closed curve to this path.

summary.span: 由于曲线经过数组中的每个点，因此使用基数样条曲线。

span.span: A cardinal spline curve is used because the curve travels through each of the points in the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要则用户必须保留原始的点。The user must keep the original points if they are needed. 原始点可以转换为三次方贝塞尔曲线的控制点在内部，因此没有用于返回原始点机制。The original points are converted to cubic Bézier control points internally, therefore there is no mechanism for returning the original points. 如果第一个点和中的最后一个点`points`数组不是相同的点，通过连接这两个点来闭合曲线。If the first point and the last point in the `points` array are not the same point, the curve is closed by connecting these two points. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建六个点 （表示基数样条） 的数组。Creates an array of six points (representing a cardinal spline). - 创建一个路径，并将闭合基数样条曲线添加到 （关闭从终结点到起始点） 的路径。Creates a path and adds the closed cardinal spline curves to the path (closed from the endpoint to the starting point). - 向屏幕中绘制该路径。Draws the path to screen. 请注意，使用 0.5 的张力。Notice that a tension of 0.5 is used. remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的点`points`数组指定的多边形的顶点。The points in the `points` array specify the vertices of a polygon. 如果数组中的第一个点不是最后一个点相同，将连接这两个点来闭合该多边形。If the first point in the array is not the same as the last point, those two points are connected to close the polygon. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建定义多边形的点数组。Creates an array of points that defines a polygon. - 创建一个路径，并向该路径添加多边形。Creates a path and adds the polygon to the path. - 在屏幕上绘制该路径。Draws the path to the screen. First, notice that the `fontStyle` argument is cast as an integer. 这样的两个或多个方法都将需要这成员可以组合起来，以创建所需的字体样式 (在这种情况下，和)。The method requires this so that two or more members can be combined to create the desired font style (in this case, and ). 其次，注意使用方法而不是方法。Secondly, notice that the method is used rather than the method. 如果使用时，呈现实心文字，而如果是使用，该文本则为轮廓样式。If is used, solid text is rendered, whereas if is used, the text will be an outline style. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#19](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#19)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CS/form1.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/VB/form1.vb#19)]

summary.span: 返回限定此 的矩形。

span.span: Returns a rectangle that bounds this .

returns.span: 一个 ，表示限定此 的矩形。

span.span: A that represents a rectangle that bounds this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回边框的大小会影响端帽、 笔的宽度和笔斜联接限制的类型，并因此生成"松配合"于被限定路径。The size of the returned bounding rectangle is influenced by the type of end caps, pen width, and pen miter limit, and therefore produces a "loose fit" to the bounded path. 近似公式是： 初始边框放大通过笔的宽度，并且此结果乘以斜角限制，加上一些额外边距以容纳端帽。The approximate formula is: the initial bounding rectangle is inflated by pen width, and this result is multiplied by the miter limit, plus some additional margin to allow for end caps. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建图形路径。Creates a graphics path. - 向其添加一个椭圆 （圆圈） 并将其绘制到屏幕。Adds an ellipse (circle) to it and draws it to the screen. - 检索调用带圆圈的边界矩形并将该矩形绘制到屏幕。Retrieves the bounding rectangle for the circle with a call to and draws the rectangle to the screen. - 创建第二个图形路径。Creates a second graphics path. - 添加一个圆形和扩大的宽度为 10 的路径。Adds a circle and widens the path to a width of 10. - 在屏幕上绘制该路径。Draws the path to the screen. - 检索第二个圆圈的边界矩形。Retrieves the bounding rectangle for the second circle. - 在屏幕上绘制的边框。Draws the bounding rectangle to the screen. - 在对话框中显示的矩形大小。Displays the rectangle size in a dialog box. 请注意，在右侧的边界矩形 （到行的附加宽度的帐户） 更大。Notice that the bounding rectangle on the right is larger (to account for the extra width of the line). [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CS/form1.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/VB/form1.vb#20)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回由字节数组属性路径中指定点类型和数据点的标志。The array of bytes returned by the property specifies point types and flags for the data points in a path. 对于每个点，位 0 到 2 指示一个点的类型和 3 到 7 位保留一组指定的点的属性的标志。For each point, bits 0 through 2 indicate the type of a point, and bits 3 through 7 hold a set of flags that specify the attributes of a point. 下表显示了可能的值以及它们的含义。The following table shows possible values and their meanings. |“值”Value|含义Meaning| |-----------|-------------| |00|指示该点是图形的开头。Indicates that the point is the start of a figure.| |11|指示该点是一条线的两个终结点之一。Indicates that the point is one of the two endpoints of a line.| |33|指示该点的三次方贝塞尔样条的终结点或管理点。Indicates that the point is an endpoint or control point of a cubic Bézier spline.| |0x70x7|屏蔽指示的 point 类型的三个低顺序位之外的所有位。Masks all bits except for the three low-order bits, which indicate the point type.| |0x200x20|指定点是一个标记。Specifies that the point is a marker.| |0x800x80|指定点已关闭的子路径 （图） 中的最后一个点。Specifies that the point is the last point in a closed subpath (figure).|

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个路径。Creates a path. - 将多个基元添加到它。Adds several primitives to it. - 将路径的点数组绘制到屏幕。Draws the path's points array to the screen. - 将路径重置为一个空状态。Resets the path to an empty state. - 重新获取该 points 数组 （如果存在）。Re-acquires the points array (if it exists). - 将数组绘制到屏幕。Draws the array to the screen. 请注意它找到重置调用之后没有数组。Notice that it finds no array following the reset call. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于单独的部分路径的路径上创建一个标记。This method creates a marker on the path that can be used to separate sections of the path. 然后，可以使用方法来循环访问路径中的标记。You can then use the methods to iterate through the markers in the path. 标记用于分隔的子路径的组。Markers are used to separate groups of subpaths. 可以在路径中的两个标记之间包含一个或多个子路径。One or more subpaths can be contained between two markers in the path. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码创建一个路径和将几个基元添加到由标记分隔的路径并绘制到屏幕的路径。The code creates a path and adds several primitives to the path separated by markers, and draws the path to the screen. span.span: Starts a new figure without closing the current figure.

summary.span: 后面添加到该路径的所有点都被添加到此新图形中。

span.span: All subsequent points added to the path are added to this new figure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要则用户必须保留原始的点。The user must keep the original points if they are needed. 原始点可以转换为三次方贝塞尔曲线的控制点在内部，因此没有用于返回原始点机制。The original points are converted to cubic Bézier control points internally, therefore there is no mechanism for returning the original points. 此方法启动新的子路径的路径中。This method starts a new subpath in the path. 子路径使您可以将一个路径部分，并使用类循环访问子路径。Subpaths allow you to separate a path into sections and use the class to iterate through the subpaths. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个路径。Creates a path. - 将添加两个集的数字。Adds two sets of figures. 第一组数字将合并到的两个图形的四个基元。The first set of figures combines four primitives into two figures. 第二组数字将合并相同的四个基元 （不过，它们在 y 轴偏移量） 到三个数字。The second set of figures combines the same four primitives (except that they are offset in the y-axis) into three figures. - 将所有图形都绘制到屏幕。Draws all the figures to the screen. 请注意，两个数字组之间出现差异。Notice the difference in the appearance between the two sets of figures. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#27](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#27)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#27](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CS/form1.cs#27)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#27](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/VB/form1.vb#27)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 转换可以缩放、 转换、 旋转或倾斜。The transformation can scale, translate, rotate, or skew the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个路径，并向该路径添加一个椭圆。Creates a path and adds an ellipse to the path. - 在屏幕上绘制路径。Draws path to the screen. - 创建一个转换矩阵来转换路径 100 个单位 x 轴方向。Creates a transform matrix to translate the path 100 units in the x-axis direction. - 在屏幕上绘制的已转换的路径。Draws the transformed path to the screen. 请注意，已转换的椭圆绘制红色，原始椭圆绘制黑色。Notice that the original ellipse is drawn in black and the transformed ellipse is drawn in red. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在此创建原始行四周的轮廓，与现有行的新轮廓之间距离等于的宽度对调用中使用。This method creates an outline around the original lines in this , with a distance between the existing lines and the new outline equal to that of the width of the used in the call to . 如果你想要填充的线条间空间必须使用而不是。If you want to fill the space between the lines you must use the rather then the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个路径，并向该路径添加两个椭圆。Creates a path and adds two ellipses to the path. - 用黑色绘制该路径。Draws the path in black. - 将加宽路径。Widens the path. - 用红色绘制该路径。Draws the path in red. 请注意，使用第二个呈现而不是，因此呈现的图具有填充的轮廓。Notice that the second rendering uses instead of , and hence the rendered figure has the outline filled.
